TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AddInAdapterAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AddInAdapterAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AddInAdapterAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 将对象标识为管线的外接程序端适配器段。

span.span: Identifies an object as an add-in-side adapter segment of the pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 方法用于维护有关可用管道段的信息的存储区，可使用此特性来标识外接程序端适配器。The and methods, which maintain the store of information about available pipeline segments, use this attribute to identify an add-in-side adapter. 此属性应仅用于激活管线段的类型。This attribute should be used only on types that activate the segments of the pipeline. 表示在宿主和外接程序之间传递的对象的类型不需要此属性。Types that represent objects passed between the host and the add-in do not need this attribute. ## Examples 下面的示例标识外接程序端适配器。The following example identifies an add-in-side adapter. [!code-csharp[AddInP1AddInSideAdapters#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInP1AddInSideAdapters/cs/Calc1ViewToContractAddInSideAdapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AddInP1AddInSideAdapters#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInP1AddInSideAdapters/vb/Calc1ViewToContractAddInSideAdapter.vb#2)]
